programme.desc: Trilogy of Error: Homer gets his thumb sliced off while trying to steal a brownie. Lisa misses the school bus. Bart discovers Fat Tony's stash of smuggled fireworks.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: I'm Goin' to Praiseland: Ned opens a Christian amusement park. At first, the tame religious attractions are unpopular. But then visitors start having visions...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Three Dreams Denied: Bart becomes a voiceover actor. Comic Book Guy is humiliated at Comic-Con. And Lisa is set up for a fall.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Road to Cincinnati: Odd couple Skinner and Chalmers embark on an 800-mile road trip to Cincinnati for an administrators convention.

programme.title: Mary Poppins Returns
programme.desc: (2018) Emily Blunt heads a stellar cast as everyone's favourite flying nanny. Can she help the grown-up Banks kids keep their home? With Meryl Streep, Lin-Manuel Miranda and Dick Van Dyke.

programme.title: New: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Brand new series - Desperately Seeking Lisa: Lisa visits Capital City with Patty and Selma, where she's swept up in the city's art scene. But the big city's got an underbelly.

programme.title: New: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Brand new series - Shoddy Heat: Grampa finds himself embroiled in a cold case when the police unearth an old coffin with his business card in it - and two bodies.

programme.title: The Lost City
programme.desc: (2022) Comedy adventure with Sandra Bullock and Channing Tatum. When a romance novelist is kidnapped wearing a pink jumpsuit, her hapless cover model heads to the jungle to rescue her.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Will's Dilemma: Simon and his new girlfriend Tara double date with Will and Tara's friend Kerry, but Will wonders if it's worth spending time with a girl he finds boring.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: The Trip to Warwick: Simon and his new girlfriend Tara are going on a trip to visit her sister at university, and the other boys decide to invite themselves along.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The Goggleboxers have been watching: The Coronation - and The Coronation Concert - First Dates, The 1% Club, The Greatest Auction, Made in Chelsea and BBC News (local elections).

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The Goggleboxers watch Eurovision, Citadel, The Greatest Auction, Family Fortunes, Open House: The Great Sex Experiment, I Kissed a Boy and The Big Celebrity Detox.

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Married couple Abbie and Charlie are missing one thing from their family: a woman to turn them into a throuple. And glamour puss Chrissie is looking for husband number four.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The Goggleboxers watch Eurovision, Citadel, The Greatest Auction, Family Fortunes, Open House: The Great Sex Experiment, I Kissed a Boy and The Big Celebrity Detox.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: I Rode a Hoverboard: Adam breaks his arm and tells his friends that he fell off a hoverboard, just like Marty McFly in Back to the Future.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: The Most Handsome Boy on the Planet: A model agency scout approaches Barry. With New Year's Eve looming, Adam tries to make Murray build bridges with his own father, Pop Pop.

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Things are frosty between Misbah and Donny. Leela faces her first Christmas without Peri and extends an olive branch to Ste. And Pearl has something she wants to get off her chest.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Things are frosty between Misbah and Donny this Christmas, but will the festive cheer bring the family closer together? Or will Donny's recent escapades be exposed?

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: It's the first Christmas without Peri, but Leela's determined to give her children and Lucas the best day she can, which means making amends with Ste. Meanwhile, Pearl has something to say.

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip from Rude Tube's naughty little sister, Rude(ish) Tube, featuring sports of the lawnmower, motorbike and bicycle variety.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Iberville Cuisine and Oyster Bar: Gordon helps Iberville Cuisine and Oyster Bar, in New Orleans, as they prepare for the Super Bowl being hosted in the city's Caesars Superdome.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: South Brooklyn: Gordon helps a debt-laden Brooklyn restaurant with constantly clashing co-owners. Can he sort out their finances before it folds?

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: I Rode a Hoverboard: Adam breaks his arm and tells his friends that he fell off a hoverboard, just like Marty McFly in Back to the Future.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: The Most Handsome Boy on the Planet: A model agency scout approaches Barry. With New Year's Eve looming, Adam tries to make Murray build bridges with his own father, Pop Pop.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Sorry Not Sorry: Lisa calls her teacher a hack and refuses to apologise. Then she learns Ms Hoover's private pain.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Yokel Hero: Cletus becomes a singing sensation, while Homer becomes a new man. But when Cletus turns on his fans he ruins everything.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Max's Bar & Grill: Gordon visits New Jersey to transform Max's Bar & Grill. It's been serving up famous hotdogs for almost 100 years, but is close to collapse.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Diwan: Gordon helps an Indian restaurant in New York that's been going for 35 years. But a decline in trade has led to fusion experiments - with mixed results.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Day of the Jackanapes: Sideshow Bob swears revenge on Krusty for accidentally erasing the first 10 years of their programme.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: New Kids on the Blecch: After cheating in the Springfield Marathon, Bart is rescued from an angry mob by a record producer and is recruited for a new boy band.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bye Bye Nerdy: When she gets bullied by a new girl at school, Lisa discovers that there's a 'nerd scent' that attracts bullies to nerds. So she invents an antidote.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Simpson Safari: The Simpsons win a holiday to Africa. But when Homer enrages a hippo, the trip soon becomes a dangerous adventure...

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: I Drank the Mold: Adam has a birthday sleepover, where his friend Garry shares out some of his dad's home brew and makes everyone sick.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: La Biblioteca Es Libros: Beverly hears Adam is failing his Spanish class and blames his teacher. Barry gets a job delivering pizzas to win Murray's respect.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Verdict: Claire is excited about giving Haley and Alex a great time on Bring Your Daughter to Work Day, but the staff don't make it easy. Gloria is thrilled to be on jury duty.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The More You Ignore Me: Claire and Phil have their hands full when Luke gets arrested for driving without a licence, and then they catch Alex sneaking out of a liquor store.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Pilot: US comedy about a group of New York City police detectives. A talented but carefree detective is taken aback when a strict new captain takes over at his precinct.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Tagger: When Peralta turns up late for morning roll call, Captain Holt responds by assigning him to a minor graffiti case and then closely monitoring his every move.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The City of New York vs. Homer Simpson: Homer must pluck up the courage to return to New York after Barney leaves his car there on a drunken binge.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Principal and the Pauper: The real Seymour Skinner (Martin Sheen) returns to Springfield, revealing that Principal Skinner is an impostor whose real name is Armin Tamzarian.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Villagers hope to enter the new year with clean slates, as relationships flourish and the Osbornes and Hutchinsons look to put past feuds behind them. But not everyone is so forgiving...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer the Whopper: Homer is chosen to appear in a superhero movie and the film studio hires a celebrity trainer (guest star Seth Rogen) to help him develop a muscular physique.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: After a life-threatening illness, Georgina's back on the dating scene and looking for a rugged man. Kate seeks a Viking while Ashley wants a man who can make a deeper connection.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: On the 'Box this time: Casualty, Queer Eye, Below Deck Sailing Yacht, FUBAR, Open House: The Great Sex Experiment, Big Beasts and BBC News(Phillip Schofield).

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The Goggleboxers have been watching: Sitting on a Fortune, Casualty, Britain's Got Talent, MerPeople, James May: Oh Cook!, The Greatest Auction and Top of the Pops 1994.

programme.title: LA Confidential
programme.desc: (1997) Curtis Hanson's thriller of cops and corruption set in 1950s LA - with Kevin Spacey, Guy Pearce, Russell Crowe and Kim Basinger. Based on James Ellroy's detective novel.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
programme.desc: (2019) Quentin Tarantino's darkly comic drama set in 60s LA, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Brad Pitt and Margot Robbie. A failing actor's world collides with the Manson Family.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: (1995) Charming family comedy-drama about a clever little pig who forms a close bond with a farmer and discovers a talent for herding sheep. With James Cromwell.

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: (1998) Charming family comedy sequel. The farm's in trouble and only a sheep-herding pig can save the day. But after a customs mix-up, Babe ends up in a boarding house for lost animals...

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence...
programme.desc: ...Interview Special: Director Roland Emmerich and stars Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth and Charlotte Gainsbourg talk about making the sci-fi sequel Independence Day: Resurgence.

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: (2018) Feel-good British family comedy. Sarah's (Beattie Edmondson) chaotic life gets even more complicated when she inherits a naughty pug from her nan.

programme.title: My Spy
programme.desc: (2020) Family action comedy. A CIA agent (Dave Bautista) gets the run-around from a nine-year-old girl when he's sent to keep an eye on her family. With Chloe Coleman.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence...
programme.desc: ...Interview Special: Director Roland Emmerich and stars Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth and Charlotte Gainsbourg talk about making the sci-fi sequel Independence Day: Resurgence.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: (2016) Sci-fi blockbuster sequel starring Jeff Goldblum. Twenty years after Earth repelled a devastating alien invasion, the extraterrestrials return to finish the job.

programme.title: Peppermint
programme.desc: (2018) Revenge thriller with Jennifer Garner. A mum turns vigilante on a quest for justice when her husband and daughter are murdered by a drug cartel.

programme.title: Stand by Me
programme.desc: (1986) Four young friends (Wil Wheaton, River Phoenix, Corey Feldman, Jerry O'Connell) set out on an expedition into deepest Oregon in this coming-of-age tale based on a Stephen King story.

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: (2018) Ryan Reynolds returns as the potty-mouthed, can of whup-ass-opening superhero and now he's got buddies to help him take on baddie Josh Brolin in the all-out action comedy sequel.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Golden Voyage of Sinbad
programme.desc: (1973) Can Sinbad stop a master magician from reaching the Fountain of Destiny on the lost land of Lemuria and being crowned the new leader of Marabia?

programme.title: Stormbreaker
programme.desc: (2006) Family action-thriller with Alex Pettyfer and Mickey Rourke. British intelligence recruit a schoolboy to take on the man who killed his dad and is planning to unleash a deadly virus.

programme.title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
programme.desc: (2019) Touching comedy-drama. An ageing golden retriever (voiced by Kevin Costner) tells the story of his life with his best pal, a budding Formula 1 driver.

programme.title: Turner & Hooch
programme.desc: (1989) Comedy-thriller starring Tom Hanks. A cop investigates a murder to which there's just one witness: Hooch, a slobbering, beer-drinking French mastiff, who now needs 24/7 protection.

programme.title: See How They Run
programme.desc: (2022) Sam Rockwell and Saoirse Ronan head a splendid ensemble for this comedy whodunnit that places a real murder among a production of Agatha Christie's The Mousetrap. With Adrien Brody.

programme.title: Assassin Club
programme.desc: (2023) Action with Henry Golding and Sam Neill. An assassin wants to retire for love, but his handler has entered him into a deadly game of hit the hitman. Can he survive to live his dream?

programme.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
programme.desc: (2018) Action comedy starring Mila Kunis and Kate McKinnon. Two friends become embroiled in espionage after one of them gets dumped by a man she didn't even know was a spy. Surprise!

programme.title: Birds of Passage
programme.desc: (2018) Hallucinatory drama charting the rise of the Colombian marijuana trade through its very immediate and profound effect on an indigenous Wayuu tribe. In Wayuu/Spanish/subs.

programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: Getting Personal
programme.desc: Deepa Shastri meets conceptual artist Louise Stern to find out why she left the safety of her deaf 'bubble' in America for the London art scene, where no one knew how to sign.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Jubal
programme.desc: (1956) Western with Glenn Ford, Ernest Borgnine, Rod Steiger and Valerie French. A cowboy is given a job by a rancher, sparking lethal jealousy in a colleague and desire in the boss's wife.

programme.title: The Black Swan
programme.desc: (1942) Swashbuckling adventure with Laird Cregar and Tyrone Power. Privateer Captain Henry Morgan tries to rid the Caribbean of pirates when he's made Governor of Jamaica. Bit rich.

programme.title: The Lady Eve
programme.desc: (1941) Screwball romcom with Barbara Stanwyck and Henry Fonda. A con artist is forced to change tack when she falls for her mark and he dumps her for trying to con him in the first place.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: (1953) Audrey Hepburn won her only Oscar in this romance as a bored princess who runs away from her duties and meets an American journalist (Gregory Peck), who shows her Rome.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: (2004) All-action thriller. Queen Latifah stars as the driver of the fastest taxi in New York, who teams up with an inept cop (Jimmy Fallon) to catch a team of female bank-robbers.

programme.title: The Dive
programme.desc: (2023) Maximilian Erlenwein's breath-holding underwater survival thriller about two sisters on a fateful diving expedition, starring Louisa Kause and Sophie Lowe.

programme.title: Underwater
programme.desc: (2020) Sci-fi horror with Kristen Stewart. Disaster strikes at an underwater facility when seabed drilling causes an earthquake, drawing the attention of a lurking menace.

programme.title: New: James Martin's Saturday Morning
programme.desc: James cooks for Grantchester's Rishi Nair and Kacey Ainsworth - and wildlife presenter Gordon Buchanan - and enjoys recipes from chefs Cyrus Todiwala and Ronnie Murray.

programme.title: New: Ainsley's Taste of the Bahamas
programme.desc: Flavour Foundations: Bahamian Classics: Ainsley Harriott focuses on Bahamian comfort food as he serves up prawn and coconut fritters with a pickled coconut slaw.

programme.title: Simply Raymond Blanc
programme.desc: Seasons: Raymond shares his love of new produce from the gardens and explains why seasonality is important with dishes including a pear almondine and a fricassee of wild mushrooms.

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

programme.desc: Ed Chamberlin presents racing from Sandown and Wincanton - the feature race celebrates some of the equine veterans of the sport who line up in a staying chase.

programme.desc: Timeslides: Smegging hilarious space sitcom. The crew discover a mutated developing fluid that allows them to travel to any place or time of which they have a photo. Cue mayhem.

programme.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys

programme.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys

programme.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Whitby to Robin Hood's Bay: Michael Portillo travels from Whitby, where he explores the port's shipbuilding and seafaring heritage, to Robin Hood's Bay, a former smuggling haven.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: New. Simon O'Brien converts a lantern into a stylish table and Henry Cole changes a fire extinguisher into a steampunk lamp as the pair visit a private railway.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: New. Max McMurdo restores a pair of designer chairs, while Henry Cole breathes new life into a decrepit garden table, transforming it into a colourful and valuable new one.

programme.title: The Thin Blue Line

programme.title: The Thin Blue Line
programme.desc: Ism Ism Ism: Rowan Atkinson teams up again with Blackadder writer Ben Elton for the police station sitcom. Fowler faces an asylum seeker and Grim faces up to a dead turkey's bottom.

programme.title: The Thin Blue Line
programme.desc: Fly on the Wall: Ben Elton and Rowan Atkinson join forces again in the hilarious police sitcom. A BBC crew comes to Gasforth to make a documentary about policing in the raw.

programme.title: The Thin Blue Line
programme.desc: Alternative Culture: Rowan Atkinson stars as the inept police inspector Raymond Fowler. A plumbing crisis at the station means the women have to share the men's locker room.

programme.title: 'Allo 'Allo!

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Just Desserts: Ronnie Barker in one of his best roles as habitual criminal Fletcher. The inmates are horrified to discover that there's a thief in their midst. Surely not...

programme.title: Porridge

programme.title: Red Dwarf
programme.desc: Timeslides: Smegging hilarious space sitcom. The crew discover a mutated developing fluid that allows them to travel to any place or time of which they have a photo. Cue mayhem.
